subject: Re: [junit] Static Var Appears Null Inside Test Case
msgSnippet: Since your main() method is never called by the test runner, GernericApplication.self is null in the test. The standard way of doing things is to have an
messageBody:
Since your main() method is never called by the test runner,
GernericApplication.self is null in the test.
The standard way of doing things is to have an instance variable myApp
in the test case class and instantiate it in the setUp() method of this
class. This way it will be reinstantiated for every single test case.
This is probably the desired behaviour.

Johannes
